description.narrative: Alleviate key barriers that inhibit faster development of wind energy in Turkey through development of transmission infrastructure, smart-grid investments, better inter-connection of wind energy locations, strengthening of transmission networks, and technical assistance; targeted 600 MW installed capacity, 10.42 MtCO2e GHG savings.

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
